## Welcome ðŸ‘‹

This is a training workshop for staff and students affiliated with the Australian National University (ANU) offered by the ANU Biological Data Science Institute (BDSI).

The workshop aims to get participants started with using R for basic computations. The workshop is suitable for those that are new to R or those who wish to have a refresher in R. It is assumed that the participants know basic statistical summaries (e.g., mean, median, standard deviation, etc).
